trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control that can be used to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controllo che può essere usato per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo viene ridimensionato automaticamente per visualizzare tutto il contenuto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il controllo viene regolata in base al contenuto; le dimensioni in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'elemento ospitato ha uno sfondo trasparente.

trans-unit.source: The BackColorTransparent property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà proprietà BackColorTransparent consente la copia del bitmap, che consente agli elementi di utilizzare la trasparenza sul contenitore dell'host di hosting.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile quando l'elemento è su un'immagine o uno sfondo sfumato.

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the BackColorTransparent property is turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: Per motivi di prestazioni, la proprietà proprietà BackColorTransparent è disattivata per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento ospitato ha uno sfondo trasparente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> le modifiche alle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the BindingContextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento BindingContextChanged, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property can be set to an active value to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>proprietà può essere impostata su un valore attivo per abilitare il supporto IME.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> ha un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>elemento; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ospitato dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Only one element can be hosted, but Child can have any number of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Può essere ospitato un solo elemento, ma figlio può avere qualsiasi numero di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Hosting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>proprietà è impostata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento fare clic su, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento ControlRemoved, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: For a more information about the CursorChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento CursorChanged, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni predefinite del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DefaultSize property, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla proprietà DefaultSize, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Immediately frees any system resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia immediatamente le risorse di sistema utilizzate da di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si fa doppio clic sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DoubleClick event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento DoubleClick, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un oggetto viene trascinato nei limiti del controllo.

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento DragEnter, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un oggetto viene trascinato fuori dai limiti del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DragLeave event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento DragLeave, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un oggetto viene trascinato sui limiti del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DragOver event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento con trascinamento, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Consente un <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> di ricevere i messaggi della tastiera correttamente quando viene aperto in maniera non modale da [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Call the EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo EnableModelessKeyboardInterop per inoltrare tutti i messaggi di tastiera quando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] finestra viene aperta in maniera non modale.

trans-unit.source: The EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo EnableModelessKeyboardInterop installa in un filtro dei messaggi di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-applicazione basata su.

trans-unit.source: The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.
trans-unit.target: Il filtro inoltra tutti i messaggi della tastiera quando è attiva la finestra non modale.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] finestra da aprire in maniera non modale.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene immesso il controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Enter event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento di invio, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il controllo ha lo stato attivo di input.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il controllo ha lo stato attivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento FontChanged, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>valore proprietà viene modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> to provide correct layout behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override dell'implementazione della classe base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>per fornire il comportamento corretto del layout per il controllo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: L'area di dimensioni personalizzate per un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: The computed by the control, given the constraints specified by proposedSize.
trans-unit.target: Il calcolato il controllo in base ai vincoli specificati da proposedSize .

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento.

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento GiveFeedback, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo riceve lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the GotFocus event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento attivato, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il contenitore padre dell'oggetto contenuto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, which is the parent container for the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore host è il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, che è il contenitore padre per l'elemento ospitato.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore host è sempre nella radice di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] gerarchia di elementi.

trans-unit.source: To access the parent of the hosted element, access HostContainer directly.
trans-unit.target: Per accedere al padre dell'elemento di hosting, accedono direttamente HostContainer.

trans-unit.source: The parent container.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore padre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la modalità IME di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: La modalità IME del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessario ridisegnare la visualizzazione del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Invalidated event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento Invalidated, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Assicura che tutti i messaggi chiave WM_CHAR vengono inoltrati all'elemento ospitato.

trans-unit.source: If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control processes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento non viene elaborato `charCode`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>controllo elabora con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: The character to forward.
trans-unit.target: Carattere da inoltrare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene premuto un tasto mentre il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the KeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento KeyDown, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene premuto un tasto mentre il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the KeyPress event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnEnabledChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnEnabledChanged consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: I dati per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnGotFocus method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo su attivato, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo OnHandleCreated, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo OnLeave, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementation of the OnPaint method forwards to the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>implementazione del metodo OnPaint inoltra all'implementazione della classe base.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Disegna lo sfondo del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnPaintBackground disegna sfondo del controllo padre in una HBITMAP.

trans-unit.source: This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency.
trans-unit.target: Questa bitmap viene utilizzata come sfondo nell'elemento di hosting per supportare la trasparenza.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] dell'infrastruttura e non deve essere utilizzato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the control to paint.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sul controllo da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Renders the control using the provided <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering del controllo utilizzando l'oggetto fornito <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*> that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>che una proprietà è stata modificata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed and requires translation.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà che è stato modificato e richiede la conversione.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo OnVisibleChanged, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo della spaziatura interna delle modifiche.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PaddingChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento PaddingChanged, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> controllo viene ridisegnato.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this event adds event handlers to the base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> event.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di questo evento aggiunge gestori eventi per la base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica prima che il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> evento quando viene premuto un tasto mentre lo stato attivo su questo controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PreviewKeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento PreviewKeyDown, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Elabora un tasto di comando, assicurando che all'elemento ospitato ha la possibilità di gestire il comando prima normale [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] l'elaborazione.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Se un messaggio chiave non viene gestito da ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, viene inoltrato lungo il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] gerarchia per l'elaborazione delle classi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passato per riferimento, che rappresenta il messaggio della finestra da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values representing the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valori che rappresenta il tasto da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il carattere è un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] collegamento chiave; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Elabora un tasto mnemonico, assicurando che all'elemento ospitato ha la possibilità di gestire il mnemonico prima normale [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] l'elaborazione.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Se un messaggio chiave non viene gestito da ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, viene inoltrato lungo il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] gerarchia per l'elaborazione delle classi.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Carattere da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il carattere è un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] collegamento chiave; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il mapping di proprietà, che determina come impostare le proprietà di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> controllo ha effetto ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologie hanno due proprietà simili ma diversi modelli.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *Mapping di proprietà* supporta l'interazione tra le due architetture.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Windows Form e WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"> </xref> che esegue il mapping <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> alle proprietà del controllo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio e consente all'origine del trascinamento di determinare se l'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio deve essere annullata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the QueryContinueDrag event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento QueryContinueDrag, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento di ridimensionamento, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Scales the parent container and the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona il contenitore padre e hosting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controllo.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: Il fattore di scala dell'asse x.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Il fattore di scala dell'asse y.

trans-unit.source: Activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Attiva l'elemento ospitato.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Select attiva all'elemento ospitato.

trans-unit.source: If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Se esiste più di un elemento di hosting, viene attivato o il primo o ultimo elemento, a seconda di `directed` e `forward` parametri.

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method do not traverse the hosted elements.
trans-unit.target: Le chiamate ripetute al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>metodo non scorrono gli elementi di hosting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select subsequent elements, call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per selezionare gli elementi successivi, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione inoltra i tasti di tabulazione da [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per specificare la direzione del controllo da selezionare; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per spostarsi in avanti nell'ordine di tabulazione; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per spostarsi all'indietro nell'ordine di tabulazione.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>valore proprietà viene modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the SizeChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento SizeChanged, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>valore proprietà viene modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the TextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'evento TextChanged, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Elabora i messaggi di Windows.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the WndProc method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo WndProc, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A message to process.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio da elaborare.
